Articles.Content: Hey I love the game and think you guys are doing an awesome job, but in the next patch could you make it so the volume isn't maxed out? it is really loud when you first start it. thx.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/59-Suggestions-and-Development-Discussion

contrary to popular belief, forums other than the general discussion forum do, in fact, exist
I do agree though. The launch clamp sound needs to be worked on for starters. If you have a lot they explode your speakers.

OMG!!!!!!!!!!!!

THIS!!!

I keep my main volume at 11%

Everything is fine.. except when I crash into water.. sometimes it almost blows my speakers.. No joke.. really needs to be worked on.
Now that we're at it, stop making the launch clamps make that "decouple" sound every time they're in loading range.
i was really talking about when you load the game for the fist time i have to lower my speakers volume all the way not to blow them.
There IS an in-game volume slider you know... which persists between sessions

I notice other things besides the volume myself.

Like crackling when there's a bit of lag, or engines cutting in and out while in map view doing a burn etc.
ya i have to. the sound gets really wavy when im doing burns a lot
